ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not think you have ever used a tomahawk so you do not know it bad side effects.  I have a stam of 65, which make me slow down a lot after 2 fight in a
ygData.messageBody:
I do not think you have ever used a tomahawk so you do not know it bad side
effects. I have a stam of 65, which make me slow down a lot after 2 fight
in a row. If there is a third mob I am dead for. But with claw I have
fought 4 barbed skeleton in Unrest and still have stam left over. Second
thing, even though the proc give you a shield of 50-150hp, but with the mob
that I hunt at lvl 22 they can do more than the average dmg to me which goes
through the shield but when I used the claw I find that I get hit very
little. As I increase in lvl the mob will hit a lot harder and I need all
the agi I can get. Third, the weapon is very slow compared to the Claw. I
hit like 4 times per melee without the dual wield. In the end the dmg is
the same or better and it helps a lot against magic users which most of the
mob that u hunt at high lvl used magic. This is my personal preference. I
think the guy I traded it with was very happy with the trade and so was I
and I can always get another tomahawk at my lvl rather than wait till lvl 30
to get a claw.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe



-----Original Message-----
From: Adam DeMarino [mailto:psycotix@...]
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 1:04 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)


From: Adam DeMarino <psycotix@...>

My god trading a tomhawk for a claw?! WTF is that. I could never trade
my tomhawk for a claw. The market isn't flooded with em on Solusek Ro,
but a tommy for a demon claw is something that wouldn't happen here. I
can't even find a worthwhile trade for my tommy anywhere on antonica.
Anychance the guy who you traded with has a seperate character on
Solusek Ro I could trade with, cause I'd be VERY happy to do business.

Talonus DuPrey
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro
